Detailed Description

Exception reading/writting files.

This class abstract the behaviour of an exception in the EDLUT simulation process. This exception could happen by reading/writting files. When an exception is thrown, the simulation is stopped without results.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008
